meanings.definition: The principles or theories of beauty and artistic taste.
meanings.sent1: Studying aestheticisms helps us understand what is considered beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated her life to exploring different aestheticisms in art.
meanings.sent3: The class on aestheticisms made everyone appreciate art in a new way.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a reflection of her deep appreciation for aestheticisms.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased various forms of aestheticisms.

meanings.definition: The pursuit of beauty or artistic expression.
meanings.sent1: Her aestheticisms led her to create stunning paintings.
meanings.sent2: Many artists are driven by their own unique aestheticisms.
meanings.sent3: His dedication to aestheticisms made him a sought-after designer.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, nature was the purest form of aestheticisms.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show was a celebration of diverse aestheticisms.

meanings.definition: The practice of emphasizing aesthetic values.
meanings.sent1: The interior designer focused on aestheticisms to create a harmonious space.
meanings.sent2: Aestheticisms play a crucial role in the world of architecture.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with aestheticisms sometimes led to quirky design choices.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a testament to her dedication to aestheticisms.
meanings.sent5: The film director's work was a blend of different aestheticisms.
